hadiths.text: It was narrated from Amr bin:Shu'aib, form his father, that his grandfather said: “The Messenger of Allah only prescribed Zakat on these five things: wheat, barley, dates, raisins and corn.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا تَجِبُ فِيهِ الزَّكَاةُ مِنَ الأَمْوَالِ
chapter.eng-name: Wealth on which Zakat is due
